statements.select: SELECT * FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() Over(order by a.LastUpdateTime desc) as rowNum, a.*,b.DrawMethodName, c.EventName,d.Title,'' as ActivityName,e.ThemeName from T_CTW_LEventInteraction as a left join T_CTW_LEventDrawMethod as b on a.DrawMethodId=b.DrawMethodId and b.IsDelete=0 left join T_CTW_PanicbuyingEvent as c on a.LeventId=c.EventId and c.IsDelete=0 left join T_CTW_LEvents as d on a.LeventId=d.EventID and d.IsDelete=0 left join T_CTW_LEventTheme as e on a.ThemeId=e.ThemeId and e.IsDelete=0 where a.IsDelete=0 and a.TemplateId=#TemplateId# ) as t where rowNum > #StartPage# and rowNum <= #EndPage#
select count(1) From T_CTW_LEventInteraction where IsDelete=0 and TemplateId=#TemplateId#
select *,null as DrawMethodName,null as EventName,null as Title,null as ActivityName,null as 'ThemeName' from T_CTW_LEventInteraction where IsDelete=0 and InteractionId=#InteractionId#
select COUNT(1) from T_CTW_LEventInteraction where IsDelete=0 and InteractionType=#InteractionType# and ThemeId=#ThemeId#
statements.insert: insert into T_CTW_LEventInteraction( InteractionId ,TemplateId ,ThemeId ,InteractionType ,DrawMethodId ,LeventId ,CreateTime ,CreateBy ,LastUpdateTime ,LastUpdateBy ,IsDelete ) VALUES ( #InteractionId#,#TemplateId#, #ThemeId#, #InteractionType#,#DrawMethodId#, #LeventId#, GetDate(), #CreateBy#, GetDate(), #LastUpdateBy#,0 )
statements.update: Update T_CTW_LEventInteraction set ThemeId=#ThemeId# ,TemplateId=#TemplateId# ,InteractionType=#InteractionType# ,DrawMethodId=#DrawMethodId# ,LeventId=#LeventId# ,LastUpdateTime=GETDATE() ,LastUpdateBy=#LastUpdateBy# where InteractionId=#InteractionId#
Update T_CTW_LEventInteraction set IsDelete=1 ,LastUpdateTime=GETDATE() ,LastUpdateBy=#LastUpdateBy# where InteractionId=#InteractionId#
